params.880:
- Upon selecting this Relic you will receive a Fairy Mushroom which can be used to teleport you to any Fairy Ring or Spirit Tree.

- The Fairy Mushroom cannot be used to teleport to an area you haven't unlocked.

- The Fairy Mushroom can be equipped in your shield slot.

- On death, the Fairy Mushroom is destroyed and can be reclaimed from the Leagues Tutor in Lumbridge.

- As this Relic gives you an item it must be unlocked at a bank.
